data.title: Kalka Dental College
data.text:
About

We invite you to explore a career in dentistry, a challenging profession with much to offer. You will discover a field rich in rewards, and personal fulfillment - a profession which is one of the most respected in India and abroad. Discover why Dentistry, the art and science behind every beautiful smile, has become a vital reinforcement towards excellent general health care for years to come. We foster an environment and attitude conducive to the progress of students to achieve excellence as an individual and in Dentistry.

Kalka Dental College was established in the year 2006 and is located on Delhi-Meerut Road. The college is surrounded by a number of neighboring villages, which provide the essential clinical material, so vital for training in the field of Life Sciences.

Conforming to the Dental Council of India (DCI) regulations, the college is fully equipped with ultra-modern equipments in the dental clinics, pre-clinical and research labs to create appropriate environment for teaching, learning and patient care.

Our BDS course is recognized by Dental Council of India and the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Government of India. The BDS course is a comprehensive 4 year program followed by 1 year compulsory paid rotatory internship. The BDS course is permanently affiliated to the prestigious Chaudhary Charan Singh University, Meerut.

Kalka Dental College also offers MDS programs in 5 specialties wiz Periodontics & Implant Dentisitry, Prosthodontics, Conservative Dentistry & Endodontics, Pedodontics and Orthodontics & Dentofacial Orthopedics approved by DCI. The MDS Course is also affiliated to the Chaudhary Charan Singh University, Meerut.

“When educating the minds of our youth, we must not forget to educate their hearts”

- Dalai Lama

Our aim is to groom a breed of 'Complete Professionals' in dental healthcare, who are 'Complete Human Beings' by inculcating in them the qualities of love, affection, respect, regards, good values, morale, adherence to medical ethics; and at the same time professional knowledge and capability comparable with the best in the profession internationally.

We strive to do it by offering them the best infrastructure, faculty with proven track record in academics as well as clinical practices, practical training in diagnosis and treatment. While doing so, we also endeavor to cater to the healthcare needs of the society by making use of our high-tech clinics, professionals, and other resources at our disposal, and thereby serve humanity.

Bolstering our Commitment to Education is our scenic well laid-out totally self-contained campus at Partapur by-pass, Meerut, U.P.
